name: Growing Ties (Atari Lynx)
description:
This game is an actual Atari Lynx game, created to celebrate the 30th birthday of the most powerful handheld console of the 90's! It's an entry for the Atari Lynx 30th birthday Programming Competition hosted by the wonderful AtariGamer.com website.

You can play it online here thanks to the wonderful emulator RetroArch (Handy core, HTML5 version by ToadKing). But you can also download the ROM for free to play it on any Atari Lynx emulator for any device.
